p:
For limiting dilution studies, single-cell suspensions of viable M6-Ctrl or M6-Hh tumor cells were prepared as described in the "Tumor dissociation” section. EpCAM +/GFP +/Lin − tumor cells, isolated by FACS, were transplanted in appropriate numbers into the fourth mammary fat pad of 3- to 4-week-old syngeneic Rag −/− mice and aged till ethical endpoint. Extreme limiting dilution analysis (ELDA
16 ) software was used to calculate the tumor-propagating cell frequency.
